# Tab

    import { Tab, TabContent } from 'zhu-vue-ui';
    Vue.component("Tab", Tab);
    Vue.component("TabContent", TabContent);
1
2
3
    <template>
        <Tab :titleItems="tabTitle" default="tab1">
            <TabContent tab-name="tab1">
                <div>tab1 content</div>
            </TabContent>
            <TabContent tab-name="tab2">
                <div>tab2 content</div>
            </TabContent>
            <TabContent tab-name="tab3">
                <div>tab3 content</div>
            </TabContent>
        </Tab>
    </template>
    <script>
        export dfault {
            data() {
                return {
                    tabTitle:[
                        {name: 'tab1', title:'标题一'},
                        {name: 'tab2', title:'标题二'},
                        {name: 'tab3', title:'标题三'}
                    ]
                };
            },
        }
    </script>

# Tab props

props说明类型默认
titleItems标题数组[{name:string, title:string}]无
default默认的tab namestring无

# TabContent props

props说明类型默认
tab-name对应的tab标题namestring无

← Checkbox Modal →
